Ryazani news

In the Ryazan region, the project " Children ' s Movements " of the National Education Project is being implemented.

17.12.2023 15:51
Children ' s Initiative Centres and Education Centres have been set up in schools and sousies.

The Kasimov deputy has shown the biggest sensation in his life.

17.12.2023 14:08
The notes indicate that the weight of fish captured is 9 kg of 540 grams.

On the Autlender Moskov highway, flying into a fur

17.12.2023 14:02
According to the picture, the accident happened near the DPS post.

Rouslan and Ludmila ' s children ' s league went to Ryazani

17.12.2023 13:30
The Tatyana Navki Show for the second year is a holiday gift for children of PSS participants, children with disabilities, large-scale poor families and children without parents.

Governor Malkov will perform three childhood dreams with the Yellows.

17.12.2023 12:58
There's a lot of people on the tree who need special attention and support.

The head of the school in Herson province thanked the razors for their gifts.

17.12.2023 12:19
On 12 December, new year ' s gifts and textbooks for children were delivered to Herson province by the Government of Ryazan province and the Ministry of Education of the Shefa region.

Early elections for the head of the Miloslav settlement are under way in Ryazan province

17.12.2023 12:16
According to the regional Ibircoma, 47.7 per cent of the voters were registered after two days.

Ryazans warned of weather deterioration

17.12.2023 08:55
Synoptics predict holoids, wet snow, holodeck reinforcements, winds up to 12-17 m/s.

Ryazans were detained for selling mephedron in Penza province

17.12.2023 08:45
Drug traffickers in 2004 and 2001 were detained by police officers in the village of Bogoslovka.

At the Ryazani refinery, the heatstrass exploded.

16.12.2023 23:58
According to the eyewitness, the location of the breakthrough is at the corner on the South District Road.

In Ryazani, an ambulance stuck in the snow for an hour.

16.12.2023 23:45
The ambulance was escorted within an hour on the street of Dzerzinsky, reported on 16 December by a group called " Ruizani " .

In Ryazan province, a remarkable marriage was registered

16.12.2023 23:29
An amazing marriage was registered at the Skopinsk Regiment, and the head of the ZACGO of the Ryazan Region of Elena Golin reported.

The Ryazans will be able to see the north night

16.12.2023 23:13
On the night of 17 December, the people of Ryazani will be able to see the northern shine, by the Rznastro, Kosmos. Ryazan. Astronomy.

In Kasimov, a woman was injured in Niva and UAZ accidents

16.12.2023 18:58
The State Inspectorate of Ryazan province made public the details of the accident that took place on 16 December.

In Ryazani, the snow had to change the trolleybus route.

16.12.2023 18:20
The trolleybuses of the 10th route follow the town on Novator Street, from the city on the usual route.

The Ryazan ZAC showed photos of young people who married in the next week.

16.12.2023 17:21
The pictures appeared in both the official unit of the department and on the page of the head of the GPSG, Helena of the 40th WC.

In Ryazan province, a volunteer forum was held within the framework of the " Education " project

16.12.2023 17:04
The Forum conducted workshops on various fronts, including the construction of masking networks, heat products and new day postcards for SBS fighters.

The Ryazans were reminded of major fines for illegal bare trees

16.12.2023 16.16
In anticipation of the new year ' s holidays in the Ryazan region ' s forests, a set of activities has been organized to protect young fists from illegal shirts.

In Kasimov, LAW and Niva faced

16.12.2023 16:05
Both cars were on the side.

On 17 December, in the Ryazan region, up to +1 degrees

16.12.2023 15:41
The Prognosis for Sunday has published the Russian Federation ' s GSP site for the region.

Traffic on the Great Light Out

16.12.2023 13:55
Drivers have to move the crash site.

The Ryazan Music Theatre has prepared two new annual plays for young guests.

16.12.2023 13:45
This year, the Ryazan Music Theatre decided to give its young viewers two plays, for older babies and children.

Construction of a boarding school in Lesno Kobeve completed

16.12.2023 12:43
The boarding school building consists of two blocks.

In Ryazani, an updated day-to-day fair was opened at QT.

16.12.2023 12:13
Visitors assessed the new comfort conditions for trade: asphalt cover has been replaced, electricity has been installed, shops, urns, container spaces have been installed, and the Ryazan Fair has been installed.

The Mitropolitan Mark spoke of the dangers of the Slope of the Kid.

16.12.2023 11:52
In his view, it is dangerous to touch the subject of banditry and to represent it to the general public.

Bus schedule to Almas Biatlon complex published

16.12.2023 10:30
Bus No. 109 leaves the Prioksky vehicle on a daily basis several times a day.

Published photos from the scene of an accident with a fur on each track under Ryazanju

16.12.2023 10
In the village of Peñnikovo of the Ryazan region, a passenger train called Moskva-Novoroskaysk and a Kamaz truck crashed.

In the Ryazan Theatre, the dolls started a new year of vision for children.

16.12.2023 09:30
This year, small razors and their parents will be shown the words " 12 months " .

The Ryazans asked for a road with a sidewalk on Serejin Gore Street.

16.12.2023 09:16
On Friday, 15 December, the mayor of Ryazani Vitaly Artemov hosted a civic reception.

Which bridges were repaired in Ryazan province in 2023

16.12.2023 08:59
In total, 10 sites across the region have been brought to the standard.
